segments.text: In spring , people are feeling refreshed . They take off their heavy winter clothes and walk with a straight back and light steps . They feel they are full of spirits and energy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Women in particular . They are anxious to get rid of those thick and clumsy winter suits and put on their new fashionable spring dress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , when summer comes , the weather is hot and the leaves turn darkgreen ; the sun is blazing and the air is threatening . No one would like to stay in the open air for long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . In summer , the first place people want to go is a spacious room with air-conditioning or a quiet river or swimming pool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I myself like very much to listen to the singing of some of the insects , especially the singing of cicadas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In autumn , almost all fruits are ripe and all crops are waiting to be harvested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you can hear singing and laughing everywhere ! People are happy in autumn because autumn brings them harvest and richness and prosperity !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , winter is a season for relaxation , do you agree with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's hard to say . For the fields and rivers , winter is a relaxing season , but for farmers , I think they might take a rest physically , but mentally they are still busy thinking , planning and calculating for the working of the next year .
segments.speaker: S1
